sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat(
	'SELECT * FROM SCB_ACTIVITY_LOG ',
	'WHERE TRANSACTION_DATE BETWEEN ''',
	variables('startDateSCB'),
	''' AND ''',
	variables('endDateSCB'),
	''''
)
